titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson, 17th Light Dragoons, Agent, Deristan to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter announces the arrival of the 2nd Battalion of the 12th Regiment, and explains the Captain's decision to split his forces between the towns of Deristan and Kishm [Qeshm]. It further outlines the arrangements made to transport 200 troops back to Bombay.
